fields.value: Logan Nelson is a freelance videographer based in Austin, TX. Offering video production for brands, musicians, and social media influencers, Logan uses cinematic filmmaking principles to highlight the value of his clients’ products and services.

Logan Nelson Cinematography

Logan Nelson is a freelance videographer based in Austin, TX. Offering video production for brands, musicians, and social media influencers, Logan uses cinematic filmmaking principles to highlight the value of his clients’ products and services.
